normalised: Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics - Are You REALLY Seeing Chai?

unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics - Are You REALLY Seeing Chai?**
normalised: Mumbai - Forget the fancy filters, are your follower analytics showing a true picture, ya? Doctor Sharma, a social media guru from I I T Delhi, says many influencers are getting fooled by vanity metrics.

unnormalised: Mumbai - Forget the fancy filters, are your follower analytics showing a true picture, ya? Dr. Sharma, a social media guru from IIT Delhi, says many influencers are getting fooled by vanity metrics.
normalised: "Just because your post got ten thousand likes doesn't mean ten thousand people will buy your rupee five thousand kurta," he warns. Fake followers and bot activity are rampant, especially amongst those chasing brand deals.

unnormalised: "Just because your post got 10,000 likes doesn't mean ten thousand people will buy your Rs. 5000 kurta," he warns. Fake followers and bot activity are rampant, especially amongst those chasing brand deals.
normalised: This Diwali season, brands are tightening their belts and demanding deeper follower analysis. They wanna know: are those followers actually engaging? Are they from India, or some random server farm five thousand kilometer away?

unnormalised: This Diwali season, brands are tightening their belts and demanding deeper follower analysis. They wanna know: are those followers actually engaging? Are they from India, or some random server farm 5000 km away?
normalised: New tools are popping up, promising to weed out the fakes and give you a real view of your audience. Think geographical demographics, interests, and even the size of their homes (some apps estimate based on location - crazy, right?).

unnormalised: New tools are popping up, promising to weed out the fakes and give you a real view of your audience. Think geographical demographics, interests, and even the size of their homes (some apps estimate based on location - crazy, right?).
normalised: One Chennai-based startup is even offering analysis based on pin codes, showing which area of a city is engaging the most – giving you a picture down to the one hundred square feet level!

unnormalised: One Chennai-based startup is even offering analysis based on pin codes, showing which area of a city is engaging the most – giving you a picture down to the 100 sq ft level!
normalised: So, before you sign that endorsement deal for that mithai brand, take a closer look at those analytics. Are you really seeing chai with your audience, or just an empty cup?

unnormalised: So, before you sign that endorsement deal for that mithai brand, take a closer look at those analytics. Are you really seeing chai with your audience, or just an empty cup?
